verses.name: Genesis 43:1
verses.text: And the famine was sore in the land.

verses.name: Genesis 43:2
verses.text: And it came to pass, when they had eaten up the corn which they had brought out of Egypt, their father said unto them, Go again, buy us a little food.

verses.name: Genesis 43:3
verses.text: And Judah spake unto him, saying, The man did solemnly protest unto us, saying, Ye shall not see my face, except your brother be with you.

verses.name: Genesis 43:4
verses.text: If thou wilt send our brother with us, we will go down and buy thee food:
